name: Big Twig's Spooky Bonanza! 2022
description:
by Eve, Alex, Renee, and Leo.

Your name is Big Twig, and you've lost track of your friends! Find all 3 of them and don't die to win. Watch out for the spooky spirits!

Tiles by Renee, Big Twig/player sprite by Leo, additonal accessory assets by Eve, and all other art assets by Alex. Base programming provided by Ryan S (teacher), edited by Eve. End Credits song was composed by Eve. Main Menu theme is from Katamari Damacy. The Level music is a song Eve has had in his files for 6 years and has searched fruitlessly for the original creator for years.
